document_data.name: Jaerloon Bucklebar
document_data.mainbody: '''Jaerloon Bucklbar''' was a [[dwarf]] [[warrior]] who inhabited the city of [[Waterdeep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Jaerloon was a white-bearded dwarf whose face was weathered by time. He presented a regal air of authority.
document_data.Activities:
He lived within [[the Raging Lion (Waterdeep)|the Raging Lion]] [[inn]] located on [[Lion Street]] in the northeastern section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}

Jaerloon, along with his close friend [[Ilmairen Arnskull]], served as a point of contact for dwarves entering Waterdeep. He enjoyed whittling wood and wrestling. Jaerloon also possessed an uncanny ability to snatch missiles out of the air.
